actions.description: The grick makes one attack with its tentacles. If that attack hits, the grick can make one beak attack against the same target.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage.
actions.name: Tentacles

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Beak

traits.description: The grick has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.
traits.name: Stone Camouflage
